title: GD, look what I got â™¥
body:
http://i.imgur.com/otNYbm9.png

Got it yesterday, it made me so happy.

So, nest changes happened like a week or two ago for those who don't know. Not all changed if I remember right just a lot/most (or maybe all, pretty sure it was most). 

They'll happen again later too so if there's a nest you like you should probably get it now, but here's the thing-- here in Sac we don't really have many if any water types... Then Seels started showing up! But they're reported in spots most people don't know about I think, which is cool because while people on the Sac Poke'GO reddit know about it, a lot of others don't, so you can run around with the cutest thing ever. 

It was kinda funny too because I went out with family (we all play together) but we had to leave at a certain time, and I was one candy short of evolving. They stopped showing up for about 40 minutes and I got super scared, then I finally got the two that I needed to evolve-- the final one giving m the final candy just 5 minutes before we had to leave. 

And get this-- its IVs?

11/15 att
11/15 stamina
15/15 defense.

37/45 total.

While 1100 may not seem insane, it caps out at 2145 but its stats for a 2145 are super good. So it's actually pretty well along the way instead of say, an Arcanine at 1100 (where it has a 2983 cap so you should probably have way way higher first). 

I'm sooo happy GD, it's beautiful!
